name: Intricate Machinery
desc: Intricate Machinery: With the majority of advanced technology requiring large zero g facilities to build and maintain, combat readiness is lowered on all Fabrique Orbitale ships by 15 percent due to a lack of adequate understanding and maintenance/repair capabilities of these systems post-collapse. In order to prevent interference when surveying, the ship’s sensor profile is reduced by 20 percent.
short: Intricate Machinery: With the majority of advanced technology requiring large zero g facilities to build and maintain, combat readiness is lowered on all Fabrique Orbitale ships by 15 percent due to a lack of adequate understanding and maintenance/repair capabilities of these systems post-collapse. In order to prevent interference when surveying, the ship’s sensor profile is reduced by 20 percent.
